Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Coffin
Description: The mummiform coffin belonging to Taini. The wig is striped in red, yellow and black and the facial expression is sombre. Below the pectoral collar is a winged sun-disk and below this are the usual vignettes including the mummy of the deceased resting on a bier. Inside the box is a full length depiction of a goddess.(For the mummy see number 1955.4).
